Translations.Text: Kintu tara naya [1], yara imana eneche [2] ebam satkaja kareche [3] ara parasparake upadesa diyeche hakera [4] ebam upadesa diyeche dhairyera
Durbhoga pratyekera, ye pichane o samane lokera ninda kare
ye sampada jamaya o ta bara bara ganana kare
se dharana kare ye, tara artha take amara kare rakhabe
kakhana'o na, se abasya'i niksipta habe [1] hutamaya
ara apanake kise janabe hutama ki
niscaya eta taderake paribestana kare rakhabe
Apani ki dekhena ni [1] apanara raba hatira adhipatidera prati ki karechilena
tini ki tadera kausala byarthataya paryabasita kare denani
ara [1] tadera birud'dhe tini jhamke jhamke pakhi pathana
yara tadera upara sakta poramatira kankara niksepa kare
Atahpara tini taderake bhaksita trna-sadrsa karena
